ROM.Changelog:
# Changelog
New System Animations [Fixed Animations lag] Say Welcome to dotOTA [up for kenzo] Added Magisk Preference Button in Settings / ROM Control Implemented Buttons Menu in ROM Control : Buttons / NavigationBar Enable/Disable and controls Updated Magsik to latest, no need to reflash for Safety Net Check [only for Mido] Added DotExtras QuickSettings section New Dialer, Gallery and MusicFX Icon Fingerprint authentication vibration Magisk Redmoved In this update will be added in next build Maybe many more Added Xiaomi Redmi Note 3[kenzo] to Official Devices list
